captions.text: Sir, hurry up. - Coming.
Son, wear these new clothes.

New clothes? Neither it's
my birthday nor any festival.
Why new clothes?

Today is a victory day
of our entire village!

Entire village's victory?
What is victory, father?

Victory is that which
we think and accomplish it.

I too thought of something.
- What's it, son?

I'll win every day from now
and acquire whatever I want.

Okay, I'll comb your hair.
- No, this is the latest style.
What if Annu doesn't like it?

Is Annu's family too
visiting the temple?

Son, Annu will come
wherever you are.

Then, you turn that side.
I will make my own style.
Haven't you both got ready yet?

Everyone is ready to leave,
get ready quickly.

How are you?
- How are you, sister?
I'm fine.

Greetings.
- I understand everything.
0:01:58.239,1193:02:47.295
Sister, how are you?
- I'm fine.

What's that hairstyle?
You don't have a comb?

We're very happy to see
you two families together.
You're right.

True friends like you
are seen only in epics...
...not in real world.

We were just laborers
working in the fields.

Because of your friendship,
we will become farmers, sir.

You both must live
happily for generations.

Not just we, our entire place
will be happy hereafter.
Come. - Come.

Mr. Vijay Pratap,
where are the white lilies?
Have you forgotten our tradition?

You didn't get flowers?
- Sister said she'd bring.
I forgot the flowers at home.

They both were troubling me
since morning in getting ready.

Listen, go home and get flowers?
- I'll bring it, mother.

You? Will you go alone?
Won't you get scared?
Scared? Me?

Cherry, I love white lilies.
Bring it for me too.

What will you give me
if I bring?
I don't want farm documents.
I'll give you this locket.
You'll get powerful wearing this.
Okay, deal done.

Greetings.
- I understand everything.

This is for mother
and this is for Annu.
Mother!
Mother! Father!
Annu!

Hey guys, welcome to
weekend games.

By the way, you all know
about this train race.
Yes! Yes!

But this time there's
a little change in the race.

This time, you'll not
compete with the train,...

...but you'll have to drive
in front of the train.

First one to go aside
is the loser!
Everyone has arrogance...

...but everyone
doesn't have courage.
It's an open challenge!

It's a risk, dude.
We can even die.

Is there kick in the race
without any risk?
That's why guys...

...the amount of the bet is
ten times more.

If you bet Rs. 10000,
you can earn Rs. 1 lakh.

Cowards! Does anyone
have courage to do it?

This means, you all agree that
I'm the champion of this game.

James the great has guts to bet,
which no one has in the market.
Hey idiot! - Alias dirt!
You are talking too much.
Hey! - Calm down.

Hey, in some time,
the entire Mumbai will know...

...that a smart guy has entered
to defeat you in racing.

Who is it? You?
- Not me, but my leader!
He must be a street leader.

He's not street leader,
but gang leader.
Gang leader?

If he takes a step,
he's like Audi.

If he shows up,
he's like 3D,...

His walk has a style,
there's a smile on his face.
There's his craze in public.

He is tough on all.
He has broad chest.
He is an iron man!
Look at the demo!
Raja. Betting Raja.
Human little, high risk!

Rat in a hole!
Will you defeat me?

This rat will bite you
so hard that...
...you'll die of pain.

I think you don't know
my track record.

Our boy is here to break,
whether it is records or bones!
You will die!

Hey arrogant! Whichever game
I play is for winning..

..I have defeated many guys
like you. Understand?
Bet on Rs. 10,000!

Our hero will win!
- Shut up!

There will be a
competition today.

Masti gang versus
Basti (colony) gang.
Sweat competes with perfume.
We will smash you!

Who is the brave guy?
None other than our Raja.
0:08:49.878,1193:02:47.295
Come on!
Hey!
careful!
Oh no! - Yeah!
Wow! - Hey.
Here's the money won in the bet.
Keep it for sister's operation.

You risked your life for my sister.
- She's my sister too.
Will you make brother cry?
Let's party!

We will open the bottle.
- You won't reform. Let's go.
Yes. - Let's get drunk.
What? Do you want a maid?
I don't work for bachelors.
Tell me after you're married.
Iron these clothes softly.

Tell me, why don't you agree
to work for those bachelors?

Listen to me. When I ask for
clothes to wash, they strip naked?

Why so early in
the morning, father?

The train comes on track and
I remembered Ram Narayan.

Though I'm drunk, I still
remember your father's name.
How could you forget him?
Father, his name is Suryanarayan.

With a peg in,
I forgot two letters.
Son, you know...

...we both are doing the duty of
your parents from past 13 years.
You are wrong.

He is doing the duty
of a son from past 13 years.
It is the same.

13 years ago, you were drunk
and lying on the railway station.
He brought you home.

Sorry son, your mother got emotional
and is forcing me to say something.

What's it? - Thanks for being
our son. - You're welcome.

Enough.. how much
more will you drink?

Have you ever thought what about
me if something happens to you?
What would happen to this?

I'll sell it and drink liquor
before it happens.

Son, see! He's never serious.
- You don't become serious now.

We have a capable son.
We'll not sell anything.

Why don't you
quit drinking, father?

I'll quit. You quit betting
and I'll quit drinking.

Both would never happen
in this life. Come out.

You come here on the first of
every month to beg.

Tell me what do you want?
- Give money to this beggar.

Are you saying
I'm a beggar?
How can I compare you with him?

He begs from every home and
you beg in front of our house.

How dare you insult the house
owner. Give me my rent. - Shut up.

Talk about rent
and electricity bill inside.

The owner is inside. Move.
- Where are you going now?
I'm going to drink.
Liquor can get rid of him,..

..but he can't get rid of it.
- What happened, uncle?

I haven't received rent
for 120 months..

..and I won't go without taking it.
Am I right?

Yes. - You know,
but you're still asking for rent?
We bet every month, don't we?

Enough is enough.
You've been fooling me constantly.

You bet every time
and I lose every time.
And the rent gets exempted.

I want it to end now
and you go away from here.

But uncle...
- Don't try to divert my mind.
I've started doing yoga.

So that you don't fool me
by diverting my mind.
So you won't go without rent?

If you don't understand Hindi
I'll tell you in English.
I go no from here.
Is it your final answer?

Lock it. - So you
won't agree like this.
Aunt Kastur!
What is it, Raja?
Aunt, my bet money.

Why will my wife
pay my bet money?

Actually, aunt placed a bet saying
you'll place a bet this month.

Because you place betting
I lost the bet today.
Will you bet on me some day?
What was the need to place bet?

He is a fraudster.
- Hey drama company.

Do the action sequence at home.
Aunt, my bet money.

Give me money. - Don't take it out.
He didn't pay rent for this month too.
Here, Raja.

Uncle, here's the rent
and this is my share. Bye.

Staying in the same area
you mess with the owner?

My women's team will avenge
you in the tomorrow's match.
I lost to a vagabond.

There's nothing interesting in life
other than victory.
I have to win over him.

Otherwise, I don't deserve
to be called James the great.
I have to defeat him. But how?
Heads!
Men have won the toss.
Yes.
Listen, women!
They play cricket with us at home.
We will play outside.
Consider bat as broom...
...and broom when batting.
And how to bowl?

Like you throw
cow dung on the wall.
Give me the centre guard.
Bowl? - It's a guard.

If you don't hit a six,
I will thrash you.
Yes! - I'm not out.

It's cheating.
I couldn't see the ball.

She was showing something else.
208
00:15:219,723 --> 00:15:19,625
We saw. Your focus was on the ball.
Don't talk too much.
Your guard fell down. - Oh.

I will make half century.
Don't worry.
Idiot, where are you playing?
Sorry, sister.
Okay. Ready.
Wait a minute, aunt.

Mother, bless me
so that I hit a six.
Aunt, I couldn't see the ball.

Are we going to lose the match?
- Hit sixes. Go.
Very good. - Six!
All the best. Very good.

Raja, the ball should
go out of the boundary.

We will do something.
Don't worry.
Father.

If you sweat,
wipe it with my sari. - Really?

If you feel thirsty, I'm ready
to quench your thirst. - Wow.

Why are you shaking hands
with him? We have to get him out.

Come on,
go back to your places.

As soon as you saw a guy
you started wooing him.

I have to get him out.
He has driven even me crazy.

Aunt, did you say something?
- Nothing.
Yes! Amazing!
Darn it. - Run, father.

Go and find the ball.
- Hurry.

What are you doing?
- One more, father.

Where is it? Go and find it.
- Run.

You're not able to find a ball.
- I wonder where it is.
Hurry.
Come on, father. Come on.

Come on, fast! - Hurry!
0:16:54.186,1193:02:47.295
Break all my records, son.
Best of luck. - Okay.

Find the ball fast.
What are you doing?
Father!
No! - Father.

Father, what happened?
- What happened?
Father, open your eyes.

Say something.
- Call the ambulance!
Father, open your eyes.
Father.
Doctor...
Father. - Come on, let's go.

I hope there's no problem, doctor?
- There's problems.

His liver is completely damaged
due to excessive drinking.

Medically it is known
as liver cirrhosis.

We can save him only through
liver transplant.
There's no other option.

Can't it be cured
with medications?

We can keep him alive on
medications, but only for a month.

How much the transplant
would cost, doctor?
Around 20 lakhs.
Mother, serve me some pilaf.

What happened, father? Why are you
putting chicken pieces in my plate?

Son, at this old age how will
I be able to eat with weak teeth?

You eat chicken and I'll have rice.
Stop annoying, have it.

Father, have food.
Why are you looking at me?

Nothing son, watching you
makes me wish to live longer.

Do you want to
save your father's life?
You are here?
What are you doing here?
There's something about you, boss.

You never go back from your words.
Even your style is unique.

Ever since I lost to you,
I've started hating myself.

I will be at peace
only after I defeat you.

Yes buddy, so far you would've won
only won Rs. 10-20,000 in betting.

But if you win this bet,
I'll give 20 lakhs you need.

But if I win, you need to
give me only a rupee.

But you won't be able
to place bets in Mumbai.

And I mustn't even hear
that you place bets.
What's the bet?

It's not car or
bike race this time.

You must trap a girl in your love.
- Trap someone in love?
What kind of a bet is this?

You say there should be kick
and risk in betting.
0:19:49.610,1193:02:47.295
It's a love race.
But what's the risk in it?

Risk is the girl's father,
Bavander Bihari.
Who is he? - Who is he?
I love only two things.

One is money and
the other is my daughter.
I was busy in making money...

..and you want to make
place in my daughter's heart?
Uncle, you're mistaken.

She asked me a question
and I answered it.

You should've answered her
question in the classroom.
Not personally.
She likes the way you study.

If she starts liking you then
what will happen to my dignity?

The punishment
for seeing my daughter...

...you will have to pay for it
by giving your life.
Bavander means ocean of death.

His daughter is precious
kohinoor diamond.

Her name is Madhavi.
She is doing BBS.

Bavander loves her
more than his life.

The salary that Madhavi's security get
paid for taking her to the college...

...50 percent of the water problem
in Mumbai will get solved.
Hey Gulati.
I'm Gulati.
I speak the language of knife...

...and I can sacrifice
my life for boss.

You must tell 'I love you'
to his daughter.
Thanks.

You brought the bet
on the right time.
I accept the bet.

But you must win the bet in 30 days.
- 30 days?
You think you're a win all.

Would there be fun without
a boundary in the match?
Today is December 2...

..on 31st, you must tell her
'I love you'.

If it doesn't happen, you must
say goodbye to betting forever.

Here's the girl's
photo and details.
James, keep 20 lakhs ready.
I like your over confidence.
Not over, just confidence.
Hi.
I will meet you in the garden.
Hey.
How dare you run into madam?
You're dead now.

You wish to go down fast
or up straight away? - Hey.
Gulati.

Order me, madam.
- Leave him.
Yes, madam.

I meant to say let him go.
Meaning, I forgave him.

Next time if you even
run into madam's shadow...

...not from here,
I'll throw you down from terrace.
Get away.

My God. The security is talking about
killing him by throwing him down.
Run away from here.

If we run away,
what will we be called? - Cowards.
We will attack directly.

And moreover indirectly.
- How is that?

Please.
- Don't touch my feet.

Are you mad? Have you lost your mind?
- Yes, I'm crazy about you.

Darn it. - Hey, if you don't agree,
I'll take you to the wedding dais.

Hey. What do you
think you're doing?

You're openly teasing a
helpless girl in the college?

It's not a college,
it is Goddess Saraswathi's abode.

Even a husband cannot tease an
Indian woman without her permission.
How dare... - Let it be.

Who are you? - I can even be
her brother just to fix you up.
Such bad era, God.
Such bad people.

College is a temple of education
and such things happens here?
Why did you hit him?
Why are you hitting him?

Sorry, sister. I should've hit him,
but I hit him instead.
Come. - I forgave you.
If any girl rejects your love...
..will you force her?

Enough of dialogues.
Come to the point.

Raja, it is now time for action.
- What did you think?
Being a man you will hurt a woman?

And this college
will just watch quietly?

Drinking liquor
and teasing girls...

...it is an old habit of
womanizers like you.
Hold this.

You will throw acid
on her if she refuses?
You will make her MMS?

You will throw her
from the terrace?
Stop. Don't clap.

Let every man
respect every woman...
...then clap.
Hello. Stop overacting. Look there.
Are you okay?
When did they becomes friends?

Not just friends,
they are in love with each other.

They're the college's best lovers.
- What are you saying?

If they marry, they can
also become best couple.

We are strange lovers.
This is how we make love.

Why didn't you
tell me earlier, sister?

You went after him like Hitler.
You never gave me a chance to say.
Let's go from here.

Which college are you from?
- Your neighboring college.

I came to see people's
reaction on social issue.

Then only see the reaction.
Don't do action.
Raja.
Come here.
Father, rest. - Okay, son.
What is it?

Raja, we got the complete
information about the girl.
Very good.

Don't get excited.
The security is very tight.

It is very difficult to meet her
in college, home or anywhere.
Be quiet. Don't discourage.

Don't worry. She goes to
dance class four days a week.

Even you join.
It'll be easy to woo her.

The security will be outside,
you both will be inside.
Nobody will come inside.

I don't want to learn dance.
- Don't learn, you can at least teach.
Teach dance?

Yes, Raja. A dance master
is coming from Chicago.

If you get rid of him,
your job is done.
Get rid of him as soon as he lands.

Look there.
Rangeela has landed.

He is Rangeela?
He looks so ugly.
Hold it straight. - Hold it straight.
Yes, baby. Yes, coming.
I just landed. Hey, watch out.

Oh my. I think all these
guys are shameless.
It will futile talking to them.
I should maintain distance.
For whom you're here?
For you. Look.

But I don't have any information
about your coming.
But we'd full information.
Because I'm popular.
Hey you, take this.
You, take this.
Laundryman, take this.

Sir, my name is not Laundryman,
it's Groundnut.

Whether it's Laundryman or
Groundnut. Hey, maintain distance.
Who are you?

You're asking us to maintain distance?
- Correct.
Who are you? - Indians.
Your currency? - Rupees.
My currency is dollars.

What's the distance
between our respective currencies?

So maintain at least
60 inches distance.
Follow me.
Greetings. Greetings.

Greetings.
- How did your present come here?
They were born on the no moon night.

They've come from Uganda
to learn dance.
Oh. - OTHER LANGUAGE

Translate.
- They're devotees of Goddess Kali.

They're here to give
you sweets in oblation.

Our people run to the sages
and these sages run to God?
Autograph please.

Autograph? Not just autograph,
I will also give you photograph.

This Audi is for me, right?
- This auto is for you.
Oh no.
Driver.

Why did you bring me to this
ruins instead of dance school?

You would've got tired
travelling long distance, right?

I brought you here to freshen up.
- Freshen up? In this ruins?

Rangeela goes to five star
hotel even to freshen up.

Not just five,
I will give you more stars.
0:29:28.501,1193:02:47.295
Who is he? - Who is he?
Come in first. - Really?

But from outside,
it looks dirty like him.

But from inside,
it looks good like you, sir.
Really? - Yes. - Come on.
Move aside.
Hey, currency distance.
How is it? Wonderful, isn't it?
Halt. Who is this woman in sari?
Housekeeping.
Housekeeping.
Hi. - What is it?
Such beautiful woman in this ruins.

Oh. What are these beautiful girls
doing here? - Room service.

Room service?
Do they know Thai massage?
They also know another massage.
What's that?
Massage with kicks and punches.
Massage with kicks and punches?

You can see
Gateway of India from here, sir.
This is your suite room.

Is this hotel suite or
municipal dumping yard?

Even my late mother-in-law
won't be able to breathe here.
Why are you staring?
This furniture looks very old.

And this fridge, seems like it was
purchased from stolen market.
Hey. - What this?

What will you do
snaping the fingers?
We need to massage, sir.

Why are you closing the door?
- To close the chapter.
Am I a history chapter to close?

If you are not
then you will become one.
Hey you, shut up.

Rangeela. - Yes.
- Never scream in silent zone.
Why? Any kid is sleeping here?

What's this?
Sugar in a diabetes patient's bag?
It is brown sugar.
Brown sugar?

Yes. - But how did it come in my bag?
- There's cocaine and gun too.

Cocaine and guns?
- Are you also fond of cocaine?

How did all this stuff
came into my bag?
Look there.
I'm dead. - Superb.

They put drugs into my bag
pretending to be devotees.
Were they protectors or destroyers?

They were nigerians who were arrested
in Mira Road drug scandal.

Everything is clear after getting
thrashed and exchange of baggage.
You kidnapped the dance master.

Now, you will go there
as master in my place.

And I'll have to serve you
becoming your assistant.

I will have to dance
to your tunes hereafter.
Am I right?
Change the music.
Colourful flowers for Mr. Rangeela.

We're here to welcome Mr. Rangeela.
You look black and white.

How did you know
that I'm not Rangeela?

You're bald and has paunch,
you can't be Rangeela.
He looks like an assistant.
You seem to be experienced.
There's master Rangeela.
Wish I could make master my mister.

I thought master would be aged like
him, but you're quite handsome.
Welcome, sir. - Thank you.
My name is master Jhilmil.

I have a sister and
she's one in a million.

Let me know if
you have a twin brother.

I will give plenty of gold as token
in marriage. - Plenty of gold?

She knows Ramba Samba,
jazz and break dance too.

She's your fan.
- My fan?

How can she be your fan?
- Assistant.
Oh, master's fan.
Come, Anarkali.
Run away from here.
Brother, master is very handsome.

She is my sister, Anarkali. This is
how she expresses her happiness.

She tears my clothes everyday,
but she won't tear yours.

Listen, get me a new shirt.
- Right away, sir.

Anarkali, today's quota of tearing
the shirt is over, go inside.

I want to do it with master.
- Do what?
Dance.
Anarkali, you're still a learner.
If you err, you'll lose impression.

Learn from him.
He will teach nicely.

Then shall I take him along, brother?
- Of course.
Assistant. - Take him.

Come. - No.
- Go black and white.

Train her well. - No, she's beautiful.
- You have another shirt?
Help. - Okay, students.

Master was introduced
to all of you today.

Your hip hop class will
begin from tomorrow.
You may go now.
Doctor, did you recognize me?
I remember you very well.

To teach her jazz,
I've to know her behavior.

By the way, student in the college
and dance master here.
What's the matter?

I was teaching part time
in college,..

..but I will teaching full time here.
- Are you pretending?
Are you here to woo me?
So what?

Will you reveal
the truth about me?

I have no time
for your futile talks.

They'll find out the truth about
you after seeing your dance...
...and throw you out from here.

And then my bodyguards will close
the chapter of your romance. - I see.
Dear, turn left.
Now, turn right.

Wow. Left okay, right okay,
headlight, okay...

...body, okay, backlight, okay
and bumper too.

But the vehicle's
pick-up is little slow.
What do you mean?

I mean, don't get angry, darling.
You are mine.

I'm young,
but I'll love you truely.
Go to hell. - All is well.
Some more. - Enough.
Son.

You're angry because my health
got spoilt due to drinking, right?

No, father. If you were not drinking
liquor then we wouldn't have met.
And if not for you we wouldn't have..

..experienced the pleasure
of having a child.
I owe you both.

Otherwise, I would've
lived like an orphan.
Stop it!

What are you doing?
Is it hip hop or lollipop?

Your stomach is shaking
more than your leg.

Students, we're about to
learn a new dance today.
There will be nonstop music.

Assistant will tell the steps
without taking any rest.
Assistant, are you ready?

I'm dead, master.
- Why did you stop?

What happened? - Even an
athlete won't run so much..
...I've danced more than him.

All my bones are
doing break-dance.
Can I drink some water?
Rangeela master.
I'm not Rangeela master.
100 percent, I'm not him.
100 percent, it is you.
He is blackmailing you...

...becoming the master
and making you dance.
How will I tell you my plight?

I've seen local goons,
I've seen national goons...

...I've also seen
international goons.

Taking my position
in front of me...

...I've seen a rowdy
for the first time.
I beg you. Please save me.
You needn't have to plead me...
...I want him to plead you.
Master.

Why are you walking like this?
- I slipped in the bathroom, master.
Slipped?
Brother, even I wish to slip.
No Anarkali, you're still young.

If you slip often,
the dance floor will break.
Don't worry.

Until when will
the leg be alright?

It might take 400-500 weeks
or whole life. - You will rest?

Then who will teach dance?
- He doesn't know how to dance.
You shut up.

I think I can never dance again.
- Go away.

Okay friends, today's class is
dismissed. Let's learn next week.
Why don't you teach, master?

Assistant is injured,
but you are fine.
Teach, master.
Who? Me? - Yes, master.

All have seen Sachin
scoring century.
They've seen Sallu romance.

But my slim sister has
never seen you dance.
Show your dance to Anarkali.

Brother. - Don't tear.
It's my last shirt.
Look madam, I'm a coach.

Whether it is cricket,
hockey or boxing...
...the coach never plays.
I'm just a guide.

Why are you watching quietly? You've
paid fees selling houses, right?

Then don't stand quietly. Ask
master to dance and not just talk.
Dance!
Dance! - He's done for.
We want!

Okay. You want me to dance, right?
- Yes.

If I get a good partner,
I will dance.

Then tell me who's a good dancer
amongst you with whom I can dance.
Madhavi! - Madhavi, go.
Impossible. No way.
Come on.
Excuse me.

Girls, there's dance
pratice going on.
And you are roaming here? Go.
So how was my touch?

You wouldn't have
slept all night, right?

If you follow me constantly,
you'll become sleepless.

You're threatening me?
- No, I'm just telling you.
Madhavi.
Daughter of Bavander Bihari.
Raja, Betting Raja.
Born to love.
I'll do anything for love.

You will love me?
You'll lose.
Girl, I've never lost in my life.
Why are you walking away?

"At times in my heart."

Sir, how much for the
wafer worth Rs.10? - Rs.10.
Rs.10? - Yes.

Will you give it for Rs.1?
- Are you crazy?

Give me half for Rs. 5.
- Go away.

You didn't give me,
hence I took it.
Don't be greedy about money.
"You're made for me."
There is no phone here.

Special ginger tea
and water for free.

I came first,
keep water on my table.

You sell wafer outside the inn
and you're a waiter inside?
Listen to me carefully now.

If I don't find steamed cake
on the table in half a second...

...I'll destroy your inn
in one second. Go.
What do you want, sir?

Do you have phone?
- It's at home.

Are you mocking? - I'm
not mocking you, sir. He hits me.

Look, I need a phone
to make an urgent call.

He has a phone, but you'll
have to clear the bill first.

Alright. Go fast.
- I'll go right away.
Listen first.

Bring four piping hot rolled breads
and egg curry. - Right away.
Today is Saturday, I don't eat egg.
Then what will you have?
Bring chilly chicken.

You just said you'd not eat egg?
- But I'll eat its mother.
Bring it.
Here's your steamed cake.

It is not fresh?
- It is fresh.
Okay, serve chutney.

Here. - Chutney must be
near steamed cake.
Here you go.
Happy?
Now, bend and eat. - No problem.

Sir, I've ordered for food.
I need to make an urgent call.
You want phone?

I've to make an urgent call
to home and then I'll give you.

Hello. - Sir, photos of people
you gave are in my inn now.

Whose photos did I give?
- I'd given.
Tell me.

They are having food
in my inn right now.
Stop them. - Send men fast, sir.

Listen dear, you'll have
to go to inn immediately.
Sir, here's the phone.

Take your time. No urgency.
- Thanks.

'The number you're
trying to call...'
Get in fast.
Thank you, boss.
You are welcome, boss.

You are here?
- Yes, partner. It's me.
Stop the vehicle.
Where had you been?
I went mad trying your number.
Give me the money.
Why are you laughing?

Won't you believe until Madhavi
expresses love before you?

You'll have to tell me
'I love you' before him. Say it.
What are you waiting for?

You know how much risk I took
for passing the three tests.

Why are you laughing?
Am I cracking a joke?

My father is battling
for his life there.

The operation was successful.
Your father is safe.
Can't you believe it, Raj?

Son, as long as I know you've
been placing bets since childhood.

Your life used to be at stake
and I used to get scared.
But your bet saved my life today.

Your friend gave
the money to the doctor..

..that's why there's happiness
on your mother's face.

You gave the money even
before winning the bet?
The day you placed the bet,..

..we knew you'd win it
on the very same day, Raja.
How do you know about the bet?

Because it's she who asked
me to place the bet.

Yes Raja, you came into
my life to save your father.

But I came into
your life willingly.

Past 13 years, I've been losing all
the bets even after winning them.
But you won every bet of life.

Your good nature to help
others touched my heart.

I was bowled over your
courage to give love letter...
...in front of my family.

You showed courage coming inside
my house and giving me a rose.
Freeing me from the security...

...you made me see the world
which I was unaware of.

Your father was to get
operated the next day...

...but you walked away leaving me
in danger. I'm grateful to you.

You've the stubbornness
of hundred people.

You've the power
of thousand people.

You've intelligence
of thousands of people.

That's why I sent my best childhood
friend James to you.

Betting was just an excuse
to come close to you.
They shouldn't get away.
James. - James.
Catch him!
Let go. Raja. - Hey.
Leave her hand or I'll kill you.
Quick.
Raja!
Raja!
James.
Hit him.
Raja. - Come.
Raja!
No!
Come.
Raja!
Raja!
Come. - No.
Cherry! - Come.
I'm... Annu.
Cherry!
Annu.
I'm your Annu.
I love you!
Cherry!
Annu!
Annu!
Annu!
Raja!
James. - Her name is Annu.
How did you know that?

Only Annu used to call me
Cherry other than my parents.

It was she who
gave me this locket.

That means..
you Mr. Suryanarayan's son?
Yes.
Oh God.
Wait a minute.

Hello, father.
Raja is Mr. Suryanarayan's son.
What?
Yes.
Come, let's go to hospital.
It's not important that I live, but..

..the truth about
you should be known.
You're unaware of a big truth.

The accident that took place in the
veneration organized by your father...
...it wasn't an accident..
...but it was planned.
'Our village Raidurg.'

'The village deity
was Goddess Bhavani.'

'But your father Suryanarayan
was a living God of the village.'

'Your father and Vijay Pratap were
good friends since college days.'

'Because of their true friendship,
on your father's saying,..

..Vijay Pratap leased
his 3000 acres of land...
...to Raidurg farmers for farming.'

'When Vijay Pratap went
to London for business...

...his brother-in-law Bavander
Bihari took advantage of it.'

Sir, through examination
we learnt that...

...this 3000 acres of land,
Vijay Pratap..

...has leased it to the
farmers for farming..
...has A-grade iron ore.

If we dig the land and
take out all the iron ore...
...we can make millions.

Congratulations.
- Congratulations to you too.

Since the farmers
shouldn't find out...
..we will name it 'power project'.

But in that pretext,
we will run our business...
...and the farmers will get ruined.

'They started showing dreams
of becoming rich to the farmers.'

'And promised people
of paying hefty salary.'

If factory comes up, the future
of our children will become bright.

'Your father tried really hard
to make them understand...
...that the project is bogus..

..and they want to confiscate
the land for iron ore.'

'But the villagers had
fallen in Bavander's traps.'

We don't care what
they're about to do.

We need to think about
our children's future.
Forgive us.

'Bavander had weaved wonderful
dreams in the eyes..
..of the innocent villagers.'

When they're not concerned
themselves..

..then why are we so concerned
about them?
Because they are our people.
They got carried away.

Vijay Pratap will be back
from London shortly.
I will then tell him everything.

'To make sure that Mr. Suryanarayan
doesn't tell the truth..
..to Vijay Pratap...
...he was kidnapped that night.'
Let go of him!

'On revealing the truth
Bavander Bihari's men threatened...
..to kill you and your mother.'

'The next day,
Vijay Pratap returned from London.'
Come, dear.

Come. -'Vijay Pratap was
desperate to see your father.'

I thought Suryanarayan
would come to receive me.
But where is he?

He has gone to the village council
regarding land work.
Come, let's go.

'He knew the sun
can rise late...

...but Suryanarayan will never
be late to meet him.'

'Vijay Pratap got suspicious
about Bavander.'
'And he went to your house.'

'Your mother's tears
revealed the truth.'
'And he got Suryanarayan released.'

'And decided to teach
a lesson to Bavander.'
Cheers!

Brother-in-law...
- Shut up.

Bavander, get out
of here right away.
'Bavander did leave the place...

...but he could never give up
the greed for the land.'

Now, the land will belong
only to the farmers.
There will be no lease now.

It's my daughter's birthday
on the coming full moon night.

And on that day, in the veneration
of Goddess Durga Bhavani...

...I will distribute all
the land documents..

...amongst the farmers
through my daughter.

If you attack his family
in this situation...

...then entire property
would go to trust.

What are you doing
taking such big books?
Find a way.
There's one way.
After Vijay Pratap's death...

..the property will belong
to his daughter. - So?

So, we will have to wait
until she becomes a major.

And after that,
by her one signature...

...all the property
will become yours.

'The land was to be given back
to the farmers the next morning.'

'The entire village was happy
as if it was some festival.'

'But when you went
to take the flower...

...the thing that no one had
even thought of, happened.'
What's going on?
Surya!
No. Don't do like this.

No. - Don't cry, dear.
Hereafter, I'm not your uncle...
...but your father.

'Embracing Madhavi, Bavander
didn't become her father...
...but of her wealth.'

'In front of the police,
those culprits...

...said that conspiracy
as transformer blast.'

'The land on which the farmers
were about to grow grains...

...the very land was
filled with their blood.'

'Your father fought for the land
and also sacrificed his life for it.'

Your father couldn't
expose those culprits...
...but you can.

I'm alive to bring those
traitors to books.

Here's the paper for
that 3000 acres land.

Go. Fulfill your
father's unfilled wish.
James.
Hey, call Bavander Bihari.
Hey, aren't you scared of me?
I knew you were nothing to me.

You're the demon
who killed my father.
Why should I fear you?
She was little...

..ever since I raised her,
how did she learn the truth?

And when she turned 18
on January 1st...

..who gave her the
idea to run away?
Why are you asking me all this?

What did your son James go
to do in the forest with them?

Why did your son put his life
at stake to save hers?

Then listen. James went to forest to
save Madhavi after I told him. - What?

My son is a bravo. He knows he's
fulfilling the duty of friendship.

And you will never
understand that.

In fact, it was I who
planned everything.
I learnt about your ill intentions.

So, I started worrying
about Madhavi's security.
So, I lied about the will.

'You can't get the property
unless Madhavi becomes major.'

I just wanted to
keep Madhavi alive...

...so that I can tell her
about your bad deeds.

Even you raised her very well
in the greed of money.

I revealed the truth about you
two months ago.

I then started looking
for such a person...

...who is brave as lion
and fast as bullet.
Explode like a bomb.

And I found
all these qualities...
...in Betting Raja.

You betrayed your own master.
How could you dare?
I learnt to be disloyal from you.

Shoot me. To brighten the houses
of many families...

...even if I die,
I've no regret.

My sacrifice won't go in vain.
Betting Raja will avenge my death.
Why will he avenge?

Why will the boy from
the shanty come to kill us?

He's not from the shanty.
He's your death.

Do you remember Raidurg village?
3rd cross?
The 2nd house.
Near village council office.
Suryanarayan.
He's Suryanarayan's brave son.
Suryanarayan's son?
What? He Suryanarayan's son?

Why is your body
trembling of fear?
Did you see how great God is?

He united me with my
childhood friend to avenge you.

He must be coming to
avenge his father's death.
To finish you all.
To grant you all a terrible death.
Like a roaring tiger...
...he will pounce on everyone.

He will grant you
such a death...

...that your soul will tremble
of fear and..
..won't ask for water too. - Shut up.
His son's call.
Here, talk. Talk to him.

Tell him to take the land documents
and come to Raidurg.

And then we will
send him to this father.

Call him, otherwise
we will kill her. Call him.
Talk to him.

Hello son, I'm coming
to Raidurg taking Madhavi.

Raja will have to come there
with the land documents.

I didn't call him
fearing Madhavi's death.

I called him so that
I can celebrate your death.
Same style, same pride.

Seeing you I
remembered your father.
Same place, same people.

But I've come here after
many years to create history.

You're a kid. You'll become a history
yourself trying to create one.
Hey you,..
..there's a history that it's public..

..who snatched the positions
of the politicians.

Same thing will happen
with you today.

I'll bury you in the same place
where you're standing.

Even I didn't come here to
waste time on unnecessary talks.
I want my Annu.
And you want the land document.
Tell me where is Annu?
Annu? I don't know.

Everyone here knows where she is,
but nobody will tell you.
Look there.

Wonderful. 13 years ago, they thought
Suryanarayan's son was dead.

But as soon as they
learnt that you're alive...
...they came running.

We want the land
and they need you.

Will you fulfill your
father's wish? Wow.

I heard that you're
an expert in betting.

And you never lose
even a single bet.
Winning is your habit.
Then let's have a bet.
If you win the bet...

...Annu is yours and
the property as well.

I put my life at stake for
the father who only raised me.

Then imagine how many people
I can kill for my real father.

You don't have you kill anyone,
but save someone's life.

Now, we've to see how you will save
the one who will die in 10 minutes.

You want to know who's
going to die in 10 minutes?
You... - Don't yell.

Remember, the place
where your family died...

...Annu is now in the same place.
Go and save her.
I swear by Goddess Durga Bhavani...

...there are 1000 houses
in this village.

If you find in which
house Annu is...

...your late father's wish
will come true. Go.
Annu!
Annu!
Annu!
Annu!
I'm coming Annu!
That's our Suryanarayan's son.

Son, they've only seen
we farmers ploughing the field...
...today, show these culprits..

...what can happen if
they pick up weapons.
Kill him.
Are you alright?
Come on.
